title: Did Trump's administration take the money from the FDNY 9/11 health fund?
subtitle: The COVID-19 epidemic has made it difficult for New York City, which has cash restrictions, to afford the costs of the 9/11 program.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Trump Administration seized money from a programme covering medical care for the sick and wounded from the first responders on 9/11.
